exceptions.tactic: intros f b a x H1 H2.
intros f' b a x H1 H2.
intros f' b' a x H1 H2.
intros f' b' a' x H1 H2.
intros f' b' a' x' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable P.
In environment f : R -> R a, b, r0 : R H0 : a = 0 -> False X : Prop x0 : Rbar H1 : is_lim f (a * r0 + b) x0 X0 : Prop Unable to unify "Finite (a * r0 + b)" with "Finite r0".

exceptions.tactic: apply Lim_comp with (g := fun y : R => a * y + b).
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), (forall y : R, f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x f : R -> R a, b, r0 : R H0 : a = 0 -> False X : Prop x0 : Rbar H1 : is_lim f (a * r0 + b) x0 X0, X1 : Prop Unable to unify "Lim (fun x : R => ?M5354 (a * x + b)) ?M5356 = Lim ?M5354 (Lim (fun y : R => a * y + b) ?M5356)" with "Lim (fun y : R => f (a * y + b)) r0 = Lim f (a * r0 + b)".

In environment S : Set H3 : forall (f g : S -> S) (x : Rbar), (forall y : S, f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x H2 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f (Lim g x) -> ex_lim g x -> Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y = Lim g x -> False) -> Lim (fun x0 : R => f (g x0)) x = Lim f (Lim g x) H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), (forall y : R, f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x f : R -> R a, b, r0 : R H0 : a = 0 -> False X : Prop x0 : Rbar H1 : is_lim f (a * r0 + b) x0 X0, X1, X2 : Prop Unable to unify "exists l : Rbar, is_lim (fun y : R => ?M5844 (?M5845 * y + ?M5846)) ?M5847 l" with "Lim (fun y : S => f (a * y + b)) r0 = Lim f (a * r0 + b)".

In environment S0 : Set P : (S0 -> S0) -> Rbar -> Prop H6 : forall (f : S0 -> S0) (a b : S0) (x : Rbar), P f (Rbar_plus (Rbar_mult a x) b) -> P (fun y : S0 => f (a * y + b)) x H5 : forall (f g : S0 -> S0) (x : Rbar), P f (Lim g x) -> P g x -> Rbar_locally' x (fun y : S0 => g y = Lim g x -> False) -> Lim (fun x0 : S0 => f (g x0)) x = Lim f (Lim g x) H4 : forall (f g : S0 -> S0) (x : Rbar), (forall y : S0, f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x S : Set H3 : forall (f g : S -> S) (x : Rbar), (forall y : S, f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x H2 : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f (Lim g x) -> ex_lim g x -> Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y = Lim g x -> False) -> Lim (fun x0 : R => f (g x0)) x = Lim f (Lim g x) H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), (forall y : R, f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x f : R -> R a, b, r0 : R H0 : a = 0 -> False X : Prop x0 : Rbar H1 : is_lim f (a * r0 + b) x0 X0, X1, X2 : Prop Unable to unify "is_lim f (a * r0 + b) x0" with "Lim (fun y : S => f (a * y + b)) r0 = Lim f (a * r0 + b)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment f : R -> R a, b : R H0 : a = 0 -> False X : Prop x0 : Rbar r0 : 0 <= a Heqs : Rle_dec 0 a = left r0 r1 : 0 < a Heqs0 : Rle_lt_or_eq_dec 0 a r0 = left r1 H1 : is_lim f p_infty x0 X0 : Prop Unable to unify "exists l : Rbar, is_lim (fun _ : R => ?M7966) ?M7967 l" with "Lim (fun y : R => f (a * y + b)) p_infty = Lim f p_infty".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment f : R -> R a, b : R H0 : a = 0 -> False X : Prop x0 : Rbar n : 0 <= a -> False Heqs : Rle_dec 0 a = right n H1 : is_lim f m_infty x0 X0 : Prop Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Lim ?M8544 ?M8545) P -> filtermap ?M8544 (Rbar_locally' ?M8545) P" with "Lim (fun y : R => f (a * y + b)) p_infty = Lim f m_infty".

In environment S : Set P : (S -> S) -> Rbar -> Prop H5 : forall (f : S -> S) (a b : S) (x : Rbar), P f (Rbar_plus (Rbar_mult a x) b) -> P (fun y : S => f (a * y + b)) x H4 : forall (a : S) (x : Rbar), P (fun _ : S => a) x H3 : forall (f g : S -> S) (x : Rbar), P f (Lim g x) -> P g x -> Rbar_locally' x (fun y : S => g y = Lim g x -> False) -> Lim (fun x0 : S => f (g x0)) x = Lim f (Lim g x) H2 : forall (f g : S -> S) (x : Rbar), (forall y : S, f y = g y) -> Lim g x = Lim f x H : forall (f : S -> S) (x : Rbar), ex_lim f x -> is_lim f x (Lim f x) f : R -> R a, b : R H0 : a = 0 -> False X : Prop x0 : Rbar n : 0 <= a -> False Heqs : Rle_dec 0 a = right n H1 : is_lim f m_infty x0 X0 : Prop Unable to unify "m_infty" with "p_infty".

The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f b a x H1 H2. unfold ex_lim in H1. unfold Rbar_plus, Rbar_mult in H1. destruct H1 as [l H1]. apply Lim_ext. intros. unfold Rbar_plus, Rbar_mult. apply Lim_comp with (g := fun y : R => a * y + b). - apply ex_lim_comp_lin. apply H1. - apply ex_lim_const. - apply Lim_correct. apply H2. - apply H2.
